pullRequest.title: Issue 4859: Interactive Demo Tool
pullRequest.bodyText:
Change log description

Initial implementation of Pravega's IDT (Interactive Demo Tool). Supports Scopes, Streams and KVTs.

Purpose of the change
Fixes #4859.
What the code does
The IDT uses the Pravega Client to do the following operations:

Scopes: create and delete.
Streams: create, delete, list, append, read.
KVTs: create, delete, put, get, remove, list keys/entries.

How to verify it

Run standalone: ./gradlew startStandalone
While standalone is running, run the tool in a different terminal:

./gradlew startInteractiveDemo -q --console=plain
-q and --console=plain are required so that Gradle will get out of the way of console IO.



(Wiki page will be built here probably after this PR is merged in).
